text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump is such a racist, there will never be a monument or building named after him! History will not be kind for Trump, he'll be remembered as the impeached WH idiot who has mishandled Covid19 and is responsible for 125,000+dead and 2.6M infected! and tweets stupidity!
